user.content: I've been constantly pressured by my family to get married lately, and it's starting to get on my nerves. Is there any way I can get some peace and quiet?

assistant.content: It seems you may want to reduce external interference in your personal life, especially your parents' pressure regarding marriage. This is related to your current career instability and your desire to focus on your own life plans, isn't it?

user.content: Yes, I currently don't have time to consider marriage and would prefer to have my own space to focus on my interests and hobbies.

assistant.content: I suggest you set aside some regular alone time each week, such as fishing or reading, which can help you relax while minimizing external distractions.

user.content: Fishing is indeed a good choice, but I'm concerned that if I do it too regularly, my family might think I'm deliberately avoiding them.

assistant.content: Your concern is quite reasonable. However, having regular private time can help your family gradually get used to and accept your lifestyle. At the same time, you can try to make them understand your needs in a gentle way.

user.content: Well, I think this suggestion is quite good, and I'll try to follow it.

assistant.content: Additionally, you could try having an honest conversation with your family to clearly express your current career plans and views on marriage, which may help alleviate their pressure from the root.

user.content: If we're going to talk directly, how do you think I should start the conversation? After all, I'm not very good at expressing this kind of sensitive topic.

assistant.content: You can start by sharing your career goals and future plans, letting them understand where your current priorities lie. Then bring up the topic of marriage, making it clear that while you do value it, it's just not a priority at the moment. This approach comes across as sincere without being too rigid.

user.content: This method sounds quite practical; I'll find an appropriate time to discuss it with my family.

assistant.content: Great! I hope this conversation helps you secure more time and space for yourself. If there's anything else you need help with, just let me know.

user.content: By the way, I'd like to participate in more outdoor activities, but I'm usually too busy with work. Do you have any suggestions?

assistant.content: It seems you're looking for a flexible way to engage in outdoor activities, so that you can enjoy stress-relieving pursuits like fishing even amidst a busy work schedule, right?

user.content: You're right, I do need a plan that better suits my work pace, preferably one that allows me to get into the groove quickly.

assistant.content: It is advisable to choose a fishing spot close to home, so you can take advantage of the short time after work to relax. This approach is very flexible and won’t take up too much personal time.

user.content: Fishing spots near home are indeed convenient, but what if the weather is bad or it's too late?

assistant.content: That's a good question. You can check the weather forecast in advance and schedule short activities during suitable time slots—even just half an hour is enough to help you relax. Moreover, choosing lightweight fishing gear can also improve your efficiency.

user.content: That's a good idea. I'll give it a try.

assistant.content: In addition, investing in a set of portable fishing gear is also a good choice, as it allows you to carry it with you anytime and anywhere, enabling you to quickly get into the fishing mindset during your free time.

user.content: Portable equipment sounds very convenient, but I wonder if the price might be too high?

assistant.content: The price range for portable equipment is actually quite broad, allowing you to choose products that fit your budget. Moreover, in the long run, this type of equipment can significantly enhance your activity experience, offering great value for money.

user.content: Then I'll look into it later. Thanks for your suggestion!

assistant.content: You're welcome! I hope these methods help you achieve a better work-life balance. If you have any other questions, feel free to come and chat with me anytime.
